overviews.content:
On his first day of high school at the formerly all-girl's Ousai Private Academy, Takatoshi Tsuda is called out for his untidy uniform by the student council president Shino Amakusa. In apology for delaying Takatoshi for his first class—and stating that the group needs a male point of view to accommodate the arrival of boys at the school—Shino offers him the position of vice president of the student council. Though unwilling, Takatoshi finds himself appointed as the newest member of the student council having yet to even step foot inside the school building.
Takatoshi soon realizes that the other student council members who are more than a little strange: President Shino, who is studious and serious in appearance, but actually a huge pervert, fascinated with the erotic and constantly making lewd jokes; the secretary Aria Shichijou, who may seem like a typical sheltered rich girl, but is just as risque as the president, if not more so; and finally, the treasurer Suzu Hagimura, who may act fairly normal, but has the body of an elementary school student and is extremely self-conscious of it. Surrounded by these colorful characters, the new vice president must now work through a nonstop assault of sexual humor and insanity.
[Written by MAL Rewrite]

data.synopsis: Ousai Academy starts a new school year. Suzu's dog, Boa, visits the school. Takatoshi's little sister joins as a first year. The student council gets concerned about improper relationships at school. Another squid scene with Takatoshi where he sprays milk on a model butt. Mutsumi sets up a match with Toki, where Toki would have to join the judo club if she loses.
data.description: Ousai Academy starts a new school year. Suzu's dog, Boa, visits the school. Takatoshi's little sister joins as a first year. The student council gets concerned about improper relationships at school. Another squid scene with Takatoshi where he sprays milk on a model butt. Mutsumi sets up a match with Toki, where Toki would have to join the judo club if she loses.

titles.en_jp: Sakura no Ki no Shita de / Maikai Tsuzuku no Kono Kanji?! / Toriaezu Nuide Miyou ka
titles.en_us: Under The Cherry Tree / Will I Get This Feeling Every Time? / For Now, Let's Try Stripping
titles.ja_jp: 桜の木の下で / 毎回続くのこの感じ?! / とりあえず脱いでみようか

data.canonicalTitle: Under The Cherry Tree / Will I Get This Feeling Every Time? / For Now, Let's Try Stripping

data.synopsis: Some gags about the art pieces in class. Suzu feels under the weather so the council has her rest in the infirmary for the school day. Shino shows Uomi the different locales on campus, but they interpret each place with something sexual. Uomi offers some concerns about the placement of the men's restroom. Aria has a spot on guessing an object based on its silhouette shape. Gags about allergies and mouse pads. Takatoshi makes a poster. The girls ask Takatoshi for tissues. Uomi asks Takatoshi if there's a girl he likes. And a follow-up to the squid episode where Hata is done with her part but Aria shows up.
data.description: Some gags about the art pieces in class. Suzu feels under the weather so the council has her rest in the infirmary for the school day. Shino shows Uomi the different locales on campus, but they interpret each place with something sexual. Uomi offers some concerns about the placement of the men's restroom. Aria has a spot on guessing an object based on its silhouette shape. Gags about allergies and mouse pads. Takatoshi makes a poster. The girls ask Takatoshi for tissues. Uomi asks Takatoshi if there's a girl he likes. And a follow-up to the squid episode where Hata is done with her part but Aria shows up.

titles.en_jp: Toki ni Kimi wa S ka M ka / Naraba Kimi no Sono Chikara wo Tamesasete Moraou / Kirakira to Kagayaku Koitsu wa Onushi no Nan Da?
titles.en_us: By the Way, Are You S or M? / In That Case I`ll Be Testing That Strength of Yours / This Thing of Yours That Sparkles Brightly. What Is It?
titles.ja_jp: 時に君はSかMか / ならば君のその力を試させてもらおう / きらきらと輝くこいつはお主のなんだ?

data.canonicalTitle: By the Way, Are You S or M? / In That Case I`ll Be Testing That Strength of Yours / This Thing of Yours That Sparkles Brightly. What Is It?

data.synopsis: Takatoshi asks Kotomi to act as vice president while his class goes to Okinawa. Nene has some gags involving her device. Kotomi joins Aria and Shino in morning inspections. As the class tours Okinawa, Hata appears and asks Takatoshi to check on two teachers that seem to be flirting with each other. Suzu gets separated from the group; the students and teachers look for her. When Yokohama freaks out over a display stand for spotted dick, they find Suzu. Shino ponders whether to call Takatoshi. The next day, the class visits a lighthouse and has fun at the beach; Shino, Aria and Kotomi do the same. The class feeds fish underwater while wearing diving helmets. Kotomi asks Shino whether she and Takatoshi are dating, so Shino calls Takatoshi. When Suzu and Takatoshi return they share some snacks they bought.
data.description: Takatoshi asks Kotomi to act as vice president while his class goes to Okinawa. Nene has some gags involving her device. Kotomi joins Aria and Shino in morning inspections. As the class tours Okinawa, Hata appears and asks Takatoshi to check on two teachers that seem to be flirting with each other. Suzu gets separated from the group; the students and teachers look for her. When Yokohama freaks out over a display stand for spotted dick, they find Suzu. Shino ponders whether to call Takatoshi. The next day, the class visits a lighthouse and has fun at the beach; Shino, Aria and Kotomi do the same. The class feeds fish underwater while wearing diving helmets. Kotomi asks Shino whether she and Takatoshi are dating, so Shino calls Takatoshi. When Suzu and Takatoshi return they share some snacks they bought.

titles.en_jp: Warenagara Migoto na Tsutsumi Guai Da / Kaichou! Motto Suso wo Hirogechatte Kudasai! / Mou Manpuku na no ka?!
titles.en_us: Even I Admit It's Well Wrapped / President! Open It Wider! / You Had Enough Already!?
titles.ja_jp: 我ながら見事な包み具合だ / 会長! もっと裾を広げちゃってください! / もう満腹なのか?!

data.canonicalTitle: Even I Admit It's Well Wrapped / President! Open It Wider! / You Had Enough Already!?

data.synopsis: Uomi appears at the school in Shino's gym clothes, as her own clothes got wet from the rain. She observes the council as they do their activities in the office. Hata interviews them. Shino and Takatoshi walk the halls. Kaede-chan has a segment where she walks the halls and observes each of the student council girls. In the squid segment, Takatoshi is approached by Aria, who then runs away. Nene has a trivia segment about the history of dildos. Takatoshi and the gang study at the library. Takatoshi and Kotomi have to take make-up exams, so they have a study session with the council girls at their house. Aria does a "what is this?" segment; the object is a vibrator. For Golden Week, the council members visit Aria's company amusement park and test the rides. They enjoy a dinner afterwards.

Takatoshi and Kotomi have to take make-up exams, so they have a study session with the council girls at their house. Aria does a "what is this?" segment; the object is a vibrator. For Golden Week, the council members visit Aria's company amusement park and test the rides. They enjoy a dinner afterwards.

titles.en_jp: Dakara Mienai Tokoro de Kikuzushite Iru / Omedetaa / Dakara Watashi wa Koko made de Ii
titles.en_us: So I Dress Untidy In Invisible Places / Congratulations / So It`s Fine For Me This Way.
titles.ja_jp: だから見えないところで着崩している / おめでたー / だから私はここまででいい

data.canonicalTitle: So I Dress Untidy In Invisible Places / Congratulations / So It`s Fine For Me This Way.

data.synopsis: The council members talk about food and the summer weather. An assortment of jokes from the manga. It starts to rain. Hata photographs the council members as they model the new school swimsuits. On the way home, they cut through a park. The judo girls have marathon practice by running into town, but Toki gets lost. A stray cat visits campus. The council holds a send-off assembly for the judo club.
data.description: The council members talk about food and the summer weather. An assortment of jokes from the manga. It starts to rain. Hata photographs the council members as they model the new school swimsuits. On the way home, they cut through a park. The judo girls have marathon practice by running into town, but Toki gets lost. A stray cat visits campus. The council holds a send-off assembly for the judo club.

titles.en_jp: Support Style / Pitching a Tent After the Deed / Fighting Girls

data.canonicalTitle: Support Style / Pitching a Tent After the Deed / Fighting Girls

data.synopsis: Shino is recruited to become a Japanese idol. She pictures life as one, where she gets along with the staff and does quite well at the tasks given, including modeling and singing at concerts. But when she sees Takatoshi dating a girl that resembles her, she wakes up from her dream and declines the offer. The girls ponder self-defense strategies and take lessons from the judo club. Igarashi is especially worried as it means having to interact with Takatoshi. Aria has another guessing game involving what is going on a steamy car in traffic. In the Takatoshi and Squid segments, Suzu helps Takatoshi clean up. Aria and the other girls are concerned about what they have observed.
